page.title: 17A FAVOURITE GAME.
page.content: My favourite game is a skipping game called{"Mississippi".}Two people turn the rope and two or more skip .One person jumps into the rope and starts to skip to the beat of the rhyme{"Its {up the Mississippi"}If you miss the beat then you're out.There are certain actions to be do or else you are out , When you are out you change places with one of the people who have been turning the rope.When the rhyme has finished the person in the rope jumps out and the next person jumps in,only it must be on the beat or they are out.The first word of the rhyme changes to{"down"}then{"telephone" then "pray",then "drive" and back to "up".The rhyme is repeated over and over until only one player remains in the game. This skipping game played by junior school girls in{Whickham.
